title: Glass, 1820–30
description: Medium Heavy glass. Plain tumbler shape with straight-flaring sides. Lower side divided into two nearly equal bands, the lower cut to form a polygonal based of thirteen sides, the upper of shallow diamond cutting with flattened tops. Above a double incised ring is a band of short vertical blazes. Upper two-fifths of tumbler is plain. Base is heavy, and underside has a shallow circular depression.
